name: improbably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not seem likely to happen or be true: improbably cheap prices improbably large/long Improbably, they are the best of friends. See
improbable
More examplesFewer examplesHe has an improbably large nose.Gilmore was the son of a butcher who had improbably risen to become a local prosecutor.She somewhat improbably claims that she was on her way to Texas.
